data.title: NSW CUP 2024

Is Mocredrecke staying?

Ron Griffith has been appointed as NSW Cup coach for 2024. Michael Dobson has been apppointed as Jersey Flegg Coach.

Griffiths appointed Knights NSW Cup Coach

The nib Newcastle Knights are pleased to confirm Ronald Griffiths will coach the club’s NSW Cup team for the 2024 season.

The NRLW team will need a terrific replacement for Ronald Griffin. I heard whispers that the new NRLW coach for 2024 would be a woman. What about the current national women’s coach?

so;

1 David Armstrong

2 Mocredrecke

3 Fletcher Myers

4 Mapapalangi

5 Tom Jenkins

6 Pryce/Rivett/Sutton

7 Cogger

8 Paul Bryan

9 Riley Jones

10 Brodie Jones

11 KPP/ Dylan Lucas

12 Jaxson Rahme/Cant

13 Myles Martin

14 Jacob Davis

15 Jack Cullen ???

16 Brock Grecean ???

17 Jerome McKewen/Cal Burgess

@Billy I was thinking/hoping that KPP and Lucas would be in the first 17. Do you think Cartwright will nab that spot vacated by Fitz?

Also, with Jenkins in this line up are you leaning towards Tuala being on the right wing in FG?

The NRLW team will need a terrific replacement for Ronald Griffin. I heard whispers that the new NRLW coach for 2024 would be a woman. What about the current national women’s coach?

The new women’s coach will most likely be Kylie Hilder, current NSW state of origin coach and roosters assistant coach.

Brad Donald is the Aussie women’s coach, who might lucky to keep his job given their performances this year. Aussies were awful in the second game and they had no idea how to use Tamika. Wouldn’t want him anywhere near our team

There is a trial match on this weekend, Newcastle Rebels (all best talent from the real NRL teams) v a combined Newcastle Knights NSW cup/Jersey Flegg team

So will be interesting to see what players Jersey Flegg based on the team but would be no real NSW cup talent as most 1st choices are pretty much in the NRL trial v sharks

Look this will be an interesting match.

Wouldn’t put it past me if the Real NRL Rep squad puts a number on the Knights Cup/Flegg squad.

It probably be good to see demand more respect from the knights toward the Newcastle Local Comp

Look this will be an interesting match.

Wouldn’t put it past me if the Real NRL Rep squad puts a number on the Knights Cup/Flegg squad.

Many maggots in the team?
